channel.title: Creating Extreme Big Server Need Supporters All get creds and rights!
channel.description:
[img]http://12.47.45.78/rendered/cooltext63364037.gif[/img]
MEGAPKSCAPE MASSIVE SERVER
I want to team up with loads of people and make a massive server were were all admins obviously have a forum and all have creds!
Milestones:
Tutorial Island All RS2 minigames ALMOST ALL SKILLS Skill Capes 3-5 QUESTS Inside Concert In-Game Competitions Ultimate SYIPKPKER anti cheat Azn cheat client Blocker Maybe just maybe 24hour host a webclient!!!!! All magic's Real Barrows Sara/zammy and guth spells Castle wars Pest control Highscore server
Thanks PEOPLE PM me or post here If you want to help and support
We all choose: which server base we will use Teams
Places up for grabs
Server coders 7 spaces left
server coders: megapkscape
Client coders 7 spaces left
Client coders:
dedripper
We may get our own .com site if the server owns
Thanks, Megapkscape

@H20wnage wrote:
